<h1 align="center">
  silent valley
</h1>

> the spirit must stay alive \
> even if the soul withers \
> the spirit must move forward \
> even if the forest burns \
> the spirit must light the way \
> even when darkness falls \
> and rain floods the forest floor \
> the spirit is the moon \
> the spirit is the sun \
> the spirit is life itself \
> the universe \
> and everything in between \

- y2025 m05 d09
